function.name: add_event_date
function.description: Add event by title and date.

date.description: The date to add events for, in the format "Year-Month-Day". The selected date must be within one year from Current Date.

time.description: Optional. The time to add events at, in the format "HH:MM". Leave blank if not applicable.

function.name: delete_event_date
function.description: Delete event by title and date.

title.description: The title of event that want to delete.

date.description: The date to delete events for, in the format "Year-Month-Day". The selected date must be within one year from Current Date.

function.name: update_event
function.description: update event by title and date.

title.description: The title of event that want to update.

date.description: The date to update events for, in the format "Year-Month-Day". The selected date must be within one year from Current Date.

time.description: Optional. The time to update events at, in the format "HH:MM". Leave blank if not applicable.

date.description: The date to view events for, in the format "Year-Month-Day". The selected date must be within one year from Current Date.

time.description: Optional. The time to view events at, in the format "HH:MM". Leave blank if not applicable.
